Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe holds significant value for those seeking excellence in its category. Given its high-quality features and performance, I estimate its worth to be well above $120. Considering this, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for $150. This price not only reflects the product's true value but also provides you with an opportunity to acquire it at a special rate. I trust you'll find the product to exceed your expectations. Looking forward to your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
